transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Ho? Haan ji sir.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, main Mahavir Impex se bol raha hun. Mera account hai aapke IndiaMART ke sath. 
Hanji sir.
Customer: Bilkul. To, hum to na, actually maine lead li hai ek Mexico ki. 
Hanji.
Customer: Indian number dala hua hai. Usme koi name nahi hai, koi company ka koi use uska jitne lead dali hai uska bhi name hai aur jo company ki jo mobile number show kiya hai wo Indian number hai. Wo Mexico ka to number bhi nahi hai. Aur aise hi number hai. Hmm.
Executive: Accha, aap ek minute line par rahiye, rukiye.
Customer: Haan, main nahi buy ki hai. Aise hi mere sath pichle hafte bhi hua tha ek sa who trading naam se maine USA ki lead li thi. Jab maine usko access kiya to uska bhi phone number Indian nikla aur banda bhi India mein hi keh raha hai. Wo kehta meri to company nahi hai bahar.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Main keh raha hun ma'am. Haan ji.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: To, ye bhi aise to do teen leads mein. Dekhiye, main aapko bataungi Praveen ji, dekhiye aapne lead uthai hai. Actually mein aapka jo service run kar raha hai IndiaMART mein domestic kar raha hai, right abhi filhal?
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hai na? Aapne lead uthai hai export ki, aapne kiya. To kya hota hai sir ki aapne ek lead uthai hai usme har ek lead jaise jaise India ke bhi domestic leads bhi aati hai sir to har ek lead kabhi kabhi nikalta hai ki genuine nahi hoti hai. Right? To ho sakta hai aapne wo jo lead uthai hai might be wo bhi ho sakta hai wo number nahi ho ya aap ek bari baat karke dekhiye kya pata wo Indian hai na usse baat kar acha baat kiya wo Indian Indian banda hai koi.
Customer: Accha Indian banda hai to kya bolte hai wo?
Customer: Wo kehta hai maine to dali nahi lead pehli baat to. To mujhe lag raha hai ki fake ya to aapki side se generate ho rahi hai.
Executive: Sir, fake lead dekhiye sir main manti hun kahin na kahin dekho har ek lead genuine nahi hoti hai sir. Theek hai Praveen ji. To main ye pehli baar nahi hua na mere sath 10 din pehle bhi hua.
Customer: Accha 10 din pehle bhi aapne lead aise lead uthai thi kya? Haan, aise lead uthai thi uske sath bhi aise hi hua wo company usme aise dikha rahe the. Waise to agar main baat karu sir hamara export ka alag se packages package hota hai sir ek saal ka teen saal ka agar main baat karu to theek hai to hum jo usme bhi 10 week per 10 five per week provide karte hain. Right to usme bhi agar main baat karu sir baat meri sun rahe hain na sir aap?
Executive: Haan ji haan ji. Kya keh rahe the ma'am sorry.
Executive: Hello, aap meri aawaz sun rahe hain sir baat. Haan haan bilkul bilkul. Haan dekhiye main ye bolna chahungi sir ki aapke paas jaise jo leads aa bhi rahe hain na main ye cheez manti hun ki har ek lead genuine nahi hoti hai aapne mujhe bataya ki 10 din pehle bhi aisa hua. Theek hai main samajh sakti hun sir but ye cheez regardingly wo leads ke upar hai abhi har ek genuine lead ho main bhi manti hun ki India mein agar har ek lead genuine nahi hoti hai sir theek hai aapne 10 din pehle bhi uthai wo wo cheez aapke sath fir se dobara se aaj uthaya fir aapke sath ye dikkat aayi to main ye bolungi sir ki aap aise lead agar aapko lagta hai to itna aap bar bar lead mat uthaye hamare packages hain sir aap wo package ko bhi avail kar sakte hain ek saal ka teen saal ka. Iska matlab iska mujhe tha ki agar lead genuine nahi hai to iska reimbursement mujhe kaise ki nahi nahi sir aisa reimbursement nahi milta hai sir. Fir aage se matlab na hi le fir lead theek hai ji main to aise hi hu fir chalega nahi na main. Haan to main aapko Praveen ji thoda sa guide karungi.
Executive: Haan to main wahi keh rahi thi ki sir hamare paas jo hai agar aap aise 706 aise mat wo kariye jaise aap amount abhi bhi aapne uthaya to hamare packages hain sir ek saal ka teen saal ka package hai hamara. Nahi nahi abhi ma'am mujhe packages maine liya hua hai India ke liye. Aapke paas leads meri nahi aa rahi thi achi leads isliye maine export ka package nahi liya isliye India ka liya hai. To usme ha usme bhi agar main ek lead le raha hun wo bhi fake nikalti hai to definitely matlab mujhe to sahi decision hai ki maine nahi liya hai. Accha accha. Nahi sir dekhiye aisa nahi hai hamara agar main baat karu to export ka renewal bhi renewal percentage kafi acha hai sir. Agar main baat karu to aisa nahi hai ki kafi customers hain jo export mein deal karte hain aur acha business bhi nikalte hain but wo baat alag hai kar ki aapne do lead is bar uthai aur dono leads aapko kya kehte hain is tarike ki leads mili sir aapko. Wo dekho sir kabhi kabhi ho jata hai ki genuine lead nahi nikalti hai to shayad aapke sath yahi dikkat aayi ki dono leads uthai aur dono mein yahi problem aa gayi sir. To all the way aisa nahi hota hai ji ji ji to aapka ye concern tha main ye concern close kar du Praveen ji. Mere feedback ke liye. Nahi ma'am mujhe main aap ab mujhe aadhe ghante mein call back karenge main chaliye theek hai koi nahi koi nahi main aadhe ghante mein connect karti hun Praveen ji aapko okay theek hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer received fake leads from IndiaMART.

- Wants reimbursement for fake leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained domestic and export packages.

- Executive stated reimbursement not available for fake leads.

- Executive offered to guide the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back in half an hour.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, export, domestic

seller_categories.mcat_name: PVC Coated Chain Link Mesh Fence
